th.name: patient_num
th.desc: A unique number assigned to each patient in DataWarehouse

th.name: create_date
th.desc: Date time the measure was created (trigger field for this table)

th.name: cps_key_name
th.desc: Short text name for the CPS measurement (keyvalue) sometimes this is a system generated key

th.name: ans_value
th.desc: Answer or value to the Question

th.name: program_name
th.desc: Name of the CPS program that triggered this questionnaire

th.name: program_tag
th.desc: Tag to help identify the Program

th.name: program_type
th.desc: Type of clinical program such as Self-Directed Program or Vendor Program

th.name: enroll_type
th.desc: Type of enrollments allowed in this program such as Patient Enrollment or No Enrollment

th.name: key_value_num
th.desc: A unique number assigned to each measure event

th.name: ques_num
th.desc: A number assigned to each Questionnaire
